body:
Overview

There are three types of licenses available in HackerRank for Work:

  • Developer License
  • Recruiter License
  • Interviewer License

With the help of these licenses, users can perform specific actions based on the permissions given.

Recruiter license

A recruiter license is meant for a recruiter. The recruiter license holder has full access to the platform. The recruiters can create and edit tests, questions, and reports. They can send invites to the candidates. If the user is part of the enterprise plan, they can use HackerRank Interview to create and conduct interviews.

Developer License 

A developer license is meant for a software developer or a technical manager. A user with a developer license can create and edit questions, tests, and reports. If users have availed of an enterprise plan, they can use HackerRank Interview to create and conduct interviews.

However, the users with a developer license cannot send test invites to the candidates.

Note: The company admin can disable any of these permissions by editing the user permissions if required.

 

There are two plans for the license, and the number of users you can add depends on your plan. 

PLAN THE UPPER LIMIT ON THE NUMBER OF USERS PRICING
Trial Plan 30 users (developer + recruiter licenses)  Free plan for 14 days
Enterprise Plan Depends on the number of licenses purchased  Contact sales@hackerrank.com for the price

Interviewer License

This license type and role is introduced specifically designed to give limited access to interviewing workflows. The interviewer can create questions in the library and take technical interviews using HackerRank Interview. They can also view any candidate reports that are shared with them.
title: Types of Licenses
